Welcome to the project site for the experiment described in the paper <span style="text-decoration:underline">'Bias in the shift of foraging preference for coloured objects in Trinidadian guppies, *Poecilia reticulata*'</span>. This site contains the code, model outputs, data tables, and residual diagnostics for the analyses demonstrated in the manuscript. 

The raw data used to conduct these analyses are available at the [github repository for this site](). 

The raw R code to produce the analysis is
available [here]().
